text: Luogosanto (Locusàntu, Logusàntu) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,883 people lived there. Its area is 135.07 km². It is 321 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Luogosanto
